name: Fault Tolerance
description:
Save the city before it gets consumed!

Mouse to look and select buildings. Space to advance to the next turn. Esc to pause. Home to enter freecam mode (buggy).

In the pause menu there are sliders for pixel size and mouse speed. If you want to max out your graphics card turn pixel size down! Default setting should be fine for integrated chips.
